name: Diamond Deeps
description: As Barry the miner, scurry around the mines collecting diamonds before the ghosts can capture you.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP Processor: Core2 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 Storage: 50 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Great game. It's quite challenging and puts a great twist to a side-scrolling platformer. It gets frustrating at first since you're just trying to learn how to use the freeze mechanic, but when you do get the hang of it, it's satisfying.
